price: ដែលជាសញ្ញាមកពីម្ចាស់របស់អ្នក(មូហាំម៉ាត់) ហើយ វា(ថ្ម ឬភូមិ)មិនឆ្ងាយពីពួកដែលបំពានឡើយ។
arabic: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَۖ وَمَا هِيَ مِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بِبَعِيدٖ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: musawwamatan ʿinda rabbika wamā hiya mina al-ẓālimīna bibaʿīdin
